评论详情: Really happy that I got a pair of these pants. They're very comfy and the pockets are big and deep enough to store phones and wallets. I like the urban design as well. Received a compliment for them while out and passed along where they could be purchased. Highly recommend.

These jeans definitely have a 90's look to them and I had all of the hopes but unfortunately they were too short. I'm tall and they ended up looking like they were a pair of capris...

I bought these for my teenage daughter. Here is her review of the pants.  Theyre really comfortable and breathable. the pockets are pretty deep and sturdy and the cloth is nice and thick. The buckle at the top is kinda weird though, and I've caught a little bit of skin in the clasp a lot, and that always hurts. But other than that they're pretty cute.
Cute but they are short. Way shorter than I imagined.

评论详情: I'm not sure what "medium pants" means but being a medium person I assumed they'd fit.  And they do. They are quite short though. Like... Maybe 4 inches of flooding while standing.  However I can't argue that these are pretty rad looking. Maybe size up, unless over long shorts or underlong pants are what you want.
these are comfortable they are streetwear they look like corduroy but with cotton keeps you warm as well
